title: How to set Ringtone in Moto E4 Plus
author: Rishit Patel
description: Setting a custom ringtone is an essential part of customizing your smartphone. Here is the step by step guide onÂ How to set Ringtone in Moto E4 Plus.

content.content: Customizing your smartphone according to your preferences is the best way to use it. A good ringtone is essential for a phone. Setting a custom ringtone is part of personalizing your smartphone. While it may seem challenging, today we will guide you on how to set a ringtone in Moto E4 Plus using simple methods.
How to set a ringtone in Moto E4 Plus without any third-party apps

To set a custom ringtone in Moto E4 Plus without third-party apps, follow these simple steps. Both Moto E4 Plus and Moto E4 run on Android 7.1.1, and their UIs are identical, so you can also use this method for Moto E4. A video guide on how to set a ringtone in Moto E4 Plus without third-party apps is also available.
1. First, download or save the custom ringtone you want to set on your Moto E4 Plus. It's fine if the music file is on a microSD card.
2. Now, open the pre-installed Moto file manager.

content.alt: How to set Ringtone in Moto E4 Plus Step 2

content.content: 3. Find the folder where the ringtone is saved (you can also find it under the Audios section).

content.alt: How to set Ringtone in Moto E4 Plus Step 3

content.content: 4. Copy the file by long-pressing it and then tapping the copy button (the overlapping square box button to the left of the three vertical dots) at the top.

content.alt: How to set Ringtone in Moto E4 Plus Step 4

content.content: 5. Now go to the folder Local -> Internal storage -> Ringtones.
6. Paste your ringtone here.

content.alt: How to set Ringtone in Moto E4 Plus Step 6

content.content: 7. Now go to Settings -> Sound -> Phone Ringtone.

content.alt: How to set Ringtone in Moto E4 Plus Step 7

content.content: 8. Choose your ringtone from the list that you want as the default phone ringtone.

content.alt: How to set Ringtone in Moto E4 Plus Step 8

content.content: 9. Click on OK, and you're done! The ringtone will be set!
How to set a ringtone in Moto E4 Plus using third-party apps
ES File Explorer
1. Go to Settings -> Sound -> Phone Ringtone.
2. Select ES File Explorer to open.
3. Browse to the location where your desired ringtone is saved.
4. Click on OK, and you're done! The ringtone will be set!
How to make a custom ringtone and set it as a ringtone in Moto E4 Plus using third-party apps
MP3 Cutter and Ringtone Maker

items: Tap on a song you want to make a ringtone of.
Cut the song according to your preference.
Tap on the save button on top after cutting the song.
Save it as a ringtone type by clicking on 'save'.
Tap on 'MAKE DEFAULT', and you're done! The ringtone will be set!
